item.title: Database - Fundamentals
item.description: Table of Contents What Is A Database? Database Management System (DBMS) Example Why Bother Storing Data? Examples of Facts Analysed from Stored Data Source: Toptal What Is A Database A collection of tables containing data that are used to retrieve information. A collection of potentially useful data that models real-world or conceptual objects and their relationships. Objects/Entities like People, Items, Students, etc. Relationships like Henry purchased an apple.
